name: Carrot Carnage
description:
Carrot Carnage is a game all about peace and non-violence. You play as rabbits, in levels where you actively avoid conflict with fellow moles in the territory. Help maintain the peace between bunnies and moles in this Memory Puzzle adventure... How hard can it get?

❤️  Challenge your memory and logic
❤️  Beautiful Isometric grid based Pixel Art style
❤️  Relaxed Gameplay without any conflicts
❤️  Play at your own pace and skill level
❤️  Lots of fun facts to learn as you win levels
❤️  No Ads

Made in ~30 active hrs x 2 people during the Game Jam 4 by Backtrace!
